name: Rampage Racing
description:
Rampage Racing is a racing game with destruction as its key feature!

Hop into a low poly world and race for first place.

Currently, we have two playable modes - one is a campaign where you race against AI - and the other is a time trial where you compete against players from around the world to get the best time on a weekly leaderboard.

Choose your car and its colour. Special colours can be unlocked via the time trials!
